    • 方法详细资料

      • getAudioZoneId

        public int getAudioZoneId()
        返回:
        the audio zone id where the request belongs

      • getCallState

        public int getCallState()
        返回:
        the current phone call state

        Will be one of TelephonyManager.CALL_STATE_IDLE, TelephonyManager.CALL_STATE_RINGING, TelephonyManager.CALL_STATE_OFFHOOK,

      • getActivePlaybackAttributes

        public java.util.List<AudioAttributes> getActivePlaybackAttributes()
        返回:
        audio attributes which are actively playing in the zone obtain by #getAudioZoneId()

      • getDuckedAudioAttributes

        public java.util.List<AudioAttributes> getDuckedAudioAttributes()
        返回:
        the current ducked audio attributes

      • getCarVolumeGroupInfos

        public java.util.List<CarVolumeGroupInfo> getCarVolumeGroupInfos()
        返回:
        the zone's volume infos, which can be used to determine the current state for a particular volume change
